free.util
Class PumpThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      free.util.PumpThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class PumpThread
extends java.lang.Thread

A thread which pumps information read from a given input stream into the given output stream.

getException

Returns the exception thrown while reading or writing, or null if it finished normally, without throwing an exception (read returned -1).
